name: Dinosaur Race
description:
Thieves have always been out of favor with ordinary mortals. And dinosaurs have a habit of eating all the unwanted ones, especially if it concerns their eggs. Believe me, it will be better if he does not catch up with you.

Dinosaur Race is a runner where you need to escape as far as possible from your dinosaur pursuer. After all, the evil mother does not want to part with her eggs. Earn points and use them to buy different weapons and auxiliary items in the store to facilitate this race for survival.

Features of the game:
- Increasing Complexity
- Pixel-Art
- Pleasant musical accompaniment
- Improvement Store
